mapper.insert: insert into ${tableName} ( image_url, image_path, upload_time, camera_id, lng, lat, vehicle_num, video_stream_id, image_type, presentation_time_stamp ) values ( #{imageUrl}, #{imagePath}, #{uploadTime}, #{cameraId}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{vehicleNum}, #{videoStreamId}, #{imageType}, #{presentationTimeStamp}, )
